thread.title: Here's how you can watch Astros-Royals Game 1
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch Astros-Royals Game 1

title: Here's how you can watch Astros-Royals Game 1
text:
Here's how you can watch Astros-Royals Game 1 Here's how you can watch Astros-Royals Game 1 
Oct 7, 2015; Kansas City, MO, USA; A general view of the field logo at the start of the Kansas City Royals on-field workout prior to game one of the ALDS against the Houston Astros at Kauffman Stadium. (Denny Medley/USA Today Sports) reviewjournal.com 
The Major League Baseball American League Division Series between the Houston Astros and the Kansas City Royals kicks off today with the Astros visiting Ewing M. Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City. Here's everything you need to know if you want to tune in. 
Time: 4:30 p.m. 
Game schedule for games two through five: 
Game 2: Astros at Royals, 12:30 p.m. PDT, Friday, Oct. 9 
Game 3: Royals at Astros, 1:00 p.m. PDT, Sunday, Oct. 11 
Game 4: Royals at Astros, TBD, Monday, Oct. 12 
Game 5: Astros at Royals, TBD, Wednesday, Oct. 14 Comment section guidelines The below comment section contains thoughts and opinions from users that in no way represent the views of the Las Vegas Review-Journal or GateHouse Media. This public platform is intended to provide a forum for users of reviewjournal.com to share ideas, express thoughtful opinions and carry the conversation beyond the article. Users must follow the guidelines under our Commenting Policy and are encouraged to use the moderation tools to help maintain civility and keep discussions on topic.
